title: Scripter in my game
body: I was up against a mid lane zed on another account and it wasn't until mid-game where I saw bot-like stutter stepping whenever ezreal Q's on zed. I claimed he was probably just good at dodging. But until I saw him dodge my Q (was playing lee sin jungle) completely from fog of war is when I realised he WAS scripting. His moves were inhuman and could only be done using a script. I'm not naming anyone here on boards but I'd like to know where I should report him to. People like him deserves a permanent ban.

replies.body: Aye lmao.A jinx today accused me of scripting as well.I dodged every single skillshot she and her support(morgana) threw at me.Oh well.
